amendment.description: Amendment requires each state to develop a grade crossing action plan, identifying specific solutions for improving safety at crossings, including highway-rail grade crossing closures or grade separations; and which focuses on crossings that have experienced recent grade crossing accidents or multiple accidents, or are at high risk for accidents.
